Question.Subject: Lockerz prices and ptz amounts?
Question.Content:
I'm thinking of joining Lockerz, and I want to know how much stuff costs (2 or 3 examples please) and how many points you get (on average) per day. I heard you get points from polls or something, how much is this?
thanks in advance
Question.ChosenAnswer:
They update 2-3 videos a day. Lets say 3. thats 6 points Login equals 2 points. Daily Question=2 points 10 points=1 day
More ways to earn ptz in future.
Z-list members EARN DOUBLE points.
Video games are 400 ptz, PSP3000 is 800 ptz, PSP Go is 2700, Macbook is 4000, Wii is 1000, DS is 1500, Ipod shuffle 800, Ipod nano is 1700, Ipod touch 1300.
If you need invite message me your email, ill invite you.

Answer.Content: well lockerz has a points system. fore example you get two points a day fore logging in and 2 fore watching videos and completing yes or no questions. fore rewards they will have game(xbox,ps3,wii,ds,psp) fore 400 points and mac book pro fore 4000 and those are just two examples. you also need to be invited to join which i will do gladly.

They update 2-3 videos a day. Lets say 3. thats 6 points Login equals 2 points. Daily Question=2 points 10 points=1 day
More ways to earn ptz in future.
Z-list members EARN DOUBLE points.
Video games are 400 ptz, PSP3000 is 800 ptz, PSP Go is 2700, Macbook is 4000, Wii is 1000, DS is 1500, Ipod shuffle 800, Ipod nano is 1700, Ipod touch 1300.
